title: Ricky Martin
summary: Enrique Martín Morales (Spanish pronunciation: [enˈɾike maɾˈtin moˈɾales]; born December 24, 1971), better known as Ricky Martin, is a Puerto Rican singer, songwriter and actor. Dubbed the "King of Latin Pop"[4][5][6][7][8] and the "Latin Music King",[9][10][11][12] Martin is one of the best-selling music artists of all time, having sold over 70 million records worldwide,[13]  and ranks among both the most influential Latin artists[14] and greatest music video artists of all time.[15]
